price: (108) And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white [with radiance] for the observers.
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
